content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Max Müller. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure we can come to an agreement on the rental price that suits both of us. How much were you thinking of paying?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I was hoping to pay around 650 Euro per month, all inclusive. Is that something you would consider?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 650 Euro per month is not a price I can accept. It's much lower than the market value for this apartment. I'm looking for a rental price that reflects the value of the property. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your position, Mister Heine. Would you be willing to meet me halfway? I'm willing to pay 700 Euro per month, all inclusive. I believe this is a fair price considering the size and location of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 700 Euro per month is closer to what I'm looking for, but it's still not quite there. I'm willing to negotiate, but I need a price that reflects the demand for apartments in this area. Would you be willing to go a bit higher?
name: Heinrich Heine
